OverHistory.NewCommentry: Mark Wood to Rohit Sharma Wicket
OverHistory.Commentry: Mark Wood bowling to Rohit Sharma, short of good length ball, pitching on off stump, Rohit Sharma plays a forward defensive shot WICKET Rohit Sharma c Phil Salt b Mark Wood (India 6 Runs for 1 wickets) towards Wicket Keeper
OverHistory.UPDCommentry:
EDGED AND TAKEN! Mark Wood bowling to Rohit Sharma, short of good length ball, pitching on off stump, the length squares up Rohit, catches the outside edge and Phil Salt does the rest behind stumps. It's an early blow for India.

WICKET Rohit Sharma c Phil Salt b Mark Wood (India 6 Runs for 1 wickets)
